0.dialouge: It appears to be a pamphlet someone posted here.
0.speaker: Klay

1.dialouge: It pains me greatly to say this but I-Sir Sirrington am leaving the Globe Earth Society.

2.dialouge:
I have urged my brothers in the Globe Earth Society many a times to see existence of lizard men.~
And I have unfortunately been ignored many a times.

3.dialouge: As such I will be leaving.

4.dialouge: I bid my brothers in the Globe Earth Society a fine farewell.

0.dialouge: It appears to be an old page from a journal.
0.speaker: Klay

1.dialouge: Attempts to harvest the power of jetstreams of the areas have so far proven to be ineffective.

2.dialouge: This is largely because jetstreams appear and disapear seemingly at random, even when cables are used to prevent shifting.

3.dialouge:
It is theorized that this is an effect of underground shifting.~
Further research into the nature of jetstreams are recommended.

4.dialouge: -Tomoky, First Vangaurd of the Gaia Division

0.dialouge: It appears to be an old page from a journal.~ It's very worn out.
0.speaker: Klay

1.dialouge: Dnaletsaw Elap Eht Ni Peed Era Ew
